abstract: The Dow continued its weeklong descent when second-quarter growth data came in lower than forecast.
snippet: The Dow continued its weeklong descent when second-quarter growth data came in lower than forecast.
lead_paragraph: A disappointing report on the nation’s second-quarter economic activity spurred a steep initial decline in stocks in the United States on Friday, adding to the malaise in the markets as investors wait for an outcome of the debt ceiling debate in Washington.
